name: RELOAD Library - Peer-to-Peer (P2P)
short_description:
This Project intends to become a Library implementation of the RELOAD protocol, currently a draft at IETF (http://datatracker.ietf.org/wg/p2psip/). It is written in C++.

More developers and supporters welcome.

Summary:

Implementation Name: libreload-cpp -- Contact: Frédéric-Philippe Metz -- Language: C++ -- Platform: Linux (GNU+Intel Compiler), OS X, iOS, Android (NDK Lib)) -- Application Focus: Generic RELOAD library -- RELOAD Support: early implementation status, intended Full support  -- Availability: unknown, estimated March 2012
Licensing terms: public license (not yet decided), commercial possible (when finished).
summary: C++ Implementation of the Peer-to-Peer RELOAD protocol
